Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

Interface FSMProcessor<Terminal extends java.lang.Enum<?>,​Parameter>

Type Parameters:
Terminal - terminal (in the terms of FSM)
Parameter - any cargo to pass thru the FSM to FSM callback
All Known Implementing Classes:
FSM, StackedFSM
public interface FSMProcessor<Terminal extends java.lang.Enum<?>,​Parameter>

This interface describes any Finite State Machine (FSM) processor.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void debugDisable()
    Turn off debug mode of the current FSM
    void debugEnable​(LoggerFacade logger, boolean logFailures)
    Turn on debug mode for the given FSM
    boolean isDebugEnable()
    Is debug mode on for the given FSM
    void processTerminal​(Terminal terminal, Parameter parameter)
    Process terminal with the FSM

  • Method Details

    • processTerminal

      void processTerminal​(Terminal terminal, Parameter parameter) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, FlowException

      Process terminal with the FSM

      Parameters:
      terminal - terminal to process
      parameter - parameter to pass to FSM.FSMCallback.process(FSM, Enum, Enum, Enum, Enum[], Object) method. Can be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if terminal is null
      FlowException - on any processing exceptions

    • debugEnable

      void debugEnable​(LoggerFacade logger, boolean logFailures) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Turn on debug mode for the given FSM

      Parameters:
      logger - logger to trace FSM to
      logFailures - log failed combinations of the terminal and the current FSM state
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if logger facade is null

    • debugDisable

      void debugDisable()

      Turn off debug mode of the current FSM

    • isDebugEnable

      boolean isDebugEnable()

      Is debug mode on for the given FSM

      Returns:
      true if debug mode is on
